title: Can i see who gifted me after i closed the message?
body: 1. Someone randomly gifted me the season 3 TSM icon and i have no clue who was it, because i thought it was an icon gifted by riot. Now i wanna check who gifted me but i cant find it :(

replies.body: Some players received this icon as an accident.  >.>  Per [this reddit post](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5eejd4/riot_gifted_me_a_tsm_icon/?st=ivvfkic8&sh=e67d4787), some players accidentally received the icon while the alpha tester icons were being distributed.  Our fault and your gain!
